name: Pet Bubble Shooter 2017 - Puzzle Match Game
name_original: Pet Bubble Shooter 2017 - Puzzle Match Game
description:
Pet Bubble Shooter is the best bubble shoot game!
The most thrilling bubble shooting arcade game is here! Join the action in Bubble Shooter Mania and get ready for some real bubble popping fun
Playing is easy! Simply launch bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to the highest score. Have fun,it’s free!
Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst. Clear all the bubbles to level up,lots of fun levels of puzzles with Bunny
In this game you help bunny,come on and enjoy playing with this bubble game as a kid playing and having fun at the school
HOW TO PLAY?
- Touch the screen to exploit bubbles
- You have to connect 3 or more bubbles
- Don't let the bubbles fill the screen
